description: This file sets up testing environment configurations for a Svelte project using Vitest. It mocks browser APIs such as matchMedia to enable testing in a jsdom environment.

methods.name: Object.defineProperty
methods.description: Defines a new property directly on an object, or modifies an existing property on an object, in this case mocking 'matchMedia' on 'window'.

methods.name: vi.fn
methods.description: Creates a mock function using Vitest.
